card.name: Baffling Defenses
card.text: Target creature's base power perpetually becomes 0.

card.name: Davriel's Withering
card.text: Target creature perpetually gets -1/-2.

card.name: Davriel, Soul Broker
card.text: +1: Until your next turn, whenever an opponent attacks you and/or planeswalkers you control, they discard a card. If they can't, they sacrifice an attacking creature.−2: Accept one of Davriel's offers, then accept one of Davriel's conditions.−3: Target creature perpetually gets -3/-3.

card.name: Ethereal Grasp
card.text: Tap target creature. That creature perpetually gains "This creature doesn't untap during your untap step" and "{8}: Untap this creature."

card.name: Faceless Agent
card.text: ChangelingWhen Faceless Agent enters the battlefield, seek a creature card of the most prevalent creature type in your library.

card.name: Lumbering Lightshield
card.text: When Lumbering Lightshield enters the battelfield, target opponent reveals a nonland card at random from their hand. It perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} more to cast."

card.name: Manor Guardian
card.text: When Manor Guardian dies, each player seeks a nonland card with mana value 2 or less.

card.name: Plaguecrafter's Familiar
card.text: DeathtouchWhen Plaguecrafter's Familiar enters the battlefield, choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gains deathtouch.

card.name: Ponder
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle.Draw a card.

card.name: Ranger-Captain of Eos
card.text: When Ranger-Captain of Eos enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value 1 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.Sacrifice Ranger-Captain of Eos: Your opponents can't cast noncreature spells this turn.

card.name: Return to the Ranks
card.text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)Return X target creature cards with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Sarkhan's Scorn
card.text: Sarkhan's Scorn deals damage equal to the number of turns you have begun to target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Sarkhan, Wanderer to Shiv
card.text: +1: Dragon cards in your hand perpetually gain "This spell costs {1} less to cast," and "You may pay {X} rather than pay this spell's mana cost, where X is its mana value."0: Conjure a Shivan Dragon card into your hand.−2: Sarkhan, Wanderer to Shiv deals 3 damage to target creature.

card.name: Scion of Shiv
card.text: Flying{2}{R}: Scion of Shiv perpetually gets +1/+0.

card.name: Stormfront Pegasus
card.text: Flying

card.name: Subversive Acolyte
card.text: {2}, Pay 2 life: Choose one activate only once.• Subversive Acolyte becomes a Human Cleric It gets +1/+2 and gains lifelink.• Becomes a Phyrexian. It gets +3/+3 and gains trample and "Whenever this creature is dealt damage, sacrifice that many permanents."

card.name: Thalia's Lieutenant
card.text: When Thalia's Lieutenant enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Human you control.Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Thalia's Lieutenant.

card.name: Tome of the Infinite
card.text: {U}, {T}: Conjure a random card from Tome of the Infinite's spellbook into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

card.name: Tropical Island
card.text: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)

card.name: Wingsteed Trainer
card.text: When Wingsteed Trainer enters the battlefield or attacks, conjure a Stormfront Pegasus card into your hand.
